column4: I have a linksys wireless usb dongle, and i want it to work with ubuntu 9.10...it has an id  ID 1737:0077
but I can't get it to work, I found a tutorial but it's way over my head, if anyone can help i'll give them my familys most prized cow
have it connected and run: sudo lshw -C network | grep -i product
use the line to websearch for guides
